content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Dear sir, regarding the apartment in Magdeburg, I hear a proposed rental price of 1250 Euros monthly. name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Understanding your goal to seek a lower price, I'll maintain my position as a landlord aiming for the highest possible rent. name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering your initial proposed amount and my objective to secure a lower price, I respond by saying, 'While appreciating your slight reduction to 1200 Euros monthly, I still believe there is room for further negotiation.' name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Continuing with the negotiation, as a landlord seeking the highest possible rent, I may say 'I understand your desire to lower the price more, but unfortunately, I cannot go below 1200 Euros monthly.
